key.name: enabled
key.description: If true, MATE HUD will run when invoked.

key.name: shortcut
key.summary: The keyboard shortcut used to pop-up the MATE HUD
key.description: The format looks like "<Control>a" or "<Shift><Alt>F1". The parser is fairly liberal and allows lower or upper case, and also abbreviations such as "<Ctl>" and "<Ctrl>".

key.name: tap-timeout
key.summary: The timeout between key press and release to determine if the user meant to open MATE HUD
key.description: This only applies to single key shortcuts (e.g. `Alt_L`). It prevents the HUD from showing up if the user keeps the shortcut pressed for longer than the timeout. Set to 0 to disable the timeout.

key.name: transparency
key.description: This determines the opacity level for the HUD background. Set to 0 for full transparency; set to 1 for no transparency.
